function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

Price: $27.99 - $23.19
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:31:52 UTC – Details)


Introductions:
Our Chair Floor Mat is made of thick PVC and free of the BPA.It measures 1.5mm in height, give your floor and furniture the best protection with this product.
Sturdy yet lasting material protects flooring against harsh scuffs and scratches that desk chair can cause.
In addition to its considerable strength, the hard-flooring mat also impresses with all the comforts you can expect from a high-quality office chair underlay.
Features:
-Offer a protection solution for hard floor and carpet tiles
-Anti-slip designed to achieve a strong grip without piercing or damaging your floor
-Crack and scratch resistant under standard use
-Extremely durable and impact-resistant
-Transparent
-Suitable for hardwood floor
Specifications:
-Size:47*36inches
-Weight:4.4lbs
-Material:PVC
– Thickness:0.06inches

Warm Tips
1.These mats may be rolled when packaged. In such cases, the PVC material may take a few hours to return to its original shape once unpacked.
2.The mat should be placed smooth side down (facing the floor), textured side up.

Please follow below steps:
1. Spread chair mat, begin to roll back from the front direction, put a night,it will naturally flat out.
2.Or get some warm water to make it soften, spread it to the opposite direction down.
PVC CHAIR MAT FOR LIGHT USE:Suitable for hardwood floor：vinyl, hardwood, laminate, stone, tile and concrete. Not recommended for carpet. You can use it in the office, at home and so on. It’s very convenient.
ANTI-SLIP:Frosting on the surface can achieve a strong grip which prevent the chair from slipping while controlling the roll of the chair which also helps to considerably reduce the risk of leg fatigue.
DURABILITY:The floor mat is stronger and more durable.You don’t have to worry about bending when you use it, or accidentally breaking it and causing scratches.It’s designed are designed to provide high impact resistance.
HEALTHY MATERIAL:Made of PVC and free of the BPA. It contains no volatile toxin, no special odor, for a healthy indoor environment.Even if your child is lying on the chair mat, you can rest assured.
PROTECTIVE FLOOR:Help to protect your floor from scratches and damage caused by office chair casters and protect your floor. It’s made to be convenient for persons who constantly move around in office chair.

4

Price: $39.90 - $33.14
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:30:38 UTC – Details)


Caterpillar ToughRide Heavy-Duty 4 Piece Rubber Floor Mats For Car Truck Van SUV, Black – Premium Trim to Fit Car Floor Mats, All Weather Deep Dish Automotive Floor Mats, Total Dirt Protection.
Shape and Size is Engineered to Fit Most Cars, Trucks, Vans and SUVs. Made to be trimmable to fit your vehicle’s floor contours with only a pair of Scissors. No more having to strain your back from stuffing your mats just to get them to fit. Simply cut through the lines until you find the perfect fitment. Measurements: Front: 26″ x 20″ inch Rear: 20″ x 19″ inch
Trimmable to Fit Certain Trims of the following Vehicles – F-150; Silverado; Ram; RAV4; CRV; Accord; Prius; Wrangler; Pilot; Sentra; Traverse; Tucson; Escape; Outback; CX-5; Forester; Cherokee; Explorer; Equinox; Sierra; Tacoma; Highlander; Civic; Corolla; Camry; Rogue
Maximum Weather Protection – Protect your vehicle’s flooring by catching spills, stains, dirt and debris that other floor mats can miss. These mats are durable and long lasting and will withstand normal wear and tear.
Waterproof – The uniquely constructed linear and diagonal ridges are placed strategically within the deep dish of these mats to maximize its trapping capabilities. Water, snow, mud and debris are contained and will not escape or leak through into the vehicle’s interior.
No-Slip Grip – Rubberized nibs on the bottom so the mat always stays in place – Ergonomic grooves on top to give your foot more traction & comfort.

Read more

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $199.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:23:59 UTC – Details)

From the brand

It’s not just a device stand… it’s freedom to move about your abode. That freedom can be compromised if your device stand wobbles. or can’t extend over your furniture. LEVO’s aluminum tubing and brawny joints create a structure that is sturdy to minimize wobbling. All developed by our team, these components are used throughout our LEVO line. All this greatness is backed by over 22 years of supreme manufacturer care. LEVO – Elevate your lifestyle!

LEVO for Your Tablet

Laptop Workstations

LEVO for Hospitals B07X2PXM4T

Brings the world to patientsUL Listed for use in hospitalsIncludes USB-C charging port.

ROBUST CONSTRUCTION FOR RESIDENTIAL OR COMMERCIAL USE. Sit, recline, or lie in bed and LEVO will securely hold your tablet at the perfect height and viewing angle. Flip lever height locks and 5 axis articulating swing arm for quick positioning. Simply grab the platform then swing tilt and spin it into perfect view. No clearance needed under your furniture. Includes 2 inch wheels for smooth rolling. Patented.
SUPER STURDY CONSTRUCTION minimizes annoying bouncing while surfing or typing, and protects your valuable device from tipping over. Swing-arm quickly swings and folds when not in use, or to exit your furniture. Quickly swings back in place at the exact same height and angle so you can continue surfing in deluxe style anytime.
EXTENDS 24 INCHES to the center of your device. Quickly spins from portrait to landscape so you can view your pages or photos at their best. Height adjusts from 30-56 inches (nice range) measured from floor to center of device.
INTERCHANGEABLE PLATFORMS so you can quickly switch from electronic devices to books and magazines (book platform sold separately – search B00GIJ20O6). Compatible with all iPads including 12.9 iPad Pro, Galaxy tablets, Surface, Zoom, Nexus, Nook, Fire, and other tablets and eReaders with length from 5.25 to 13.5 inches (including case), and weighing up to 4 pounds. Attach and remove your device in seconds.
LUSTROUS ANODIZED ALUMINUM finish looks fabulous in your home or office. Gunmetal color with black accents. 3-year warranty.




BOOK PLATFORM KIT
LEVO Utility Basket
Optional Accessories Platforms on this LEVO are quickly interchangeable. With our optional Book Platform Kit, you can swith from reading your tablet to reading books, magazines, cookbooks, sheet music and more. Add stowage space to your LEVO Floor Stand. Stow your stuff such as tablets, batteries, eye glasses, notebooks, headphones, medical equipment, books, or just about anything else! Except liquids… of course.








THE LEVO ON THIS PAGE
LEVO Rolling Laptop Workstation
LEVO G2 Essential Tablet Stand
LEVO G2 Table Clamp Tablet Stand
LEVO G2 Rolling Book Holder
LEVO Extend Your Phone
Best for (devices) Tablets Laptops Tablets Tablets Books, Magazines Phones
Basic Description Our most robust rolling tablet stand. Can also hold books with our optional Book Platform Kit. Our most robust rolling laptop stand. Can also hold books with our optional Book Kit. Our lightweight tablet stand. You can easily carry throughout your home or office. Can also hold books with our optional Book Platform Kit. Our tablet stand that connects to your side table, desk, kitchen counter, cart, or other surface. Very handy for travel too. Can also hold books with our optional Book Platform Kit. Our most robust rolling book stand. Can also hold tablets with our optional Dual Clamp. Our very handy phone holder. It holds your phone at eye level while you sit in any chair. Even at the beach! Great for bed too.
Max Height – from Floor to Center of Device. 40 inches (101 cm) Measured fhes (109 cm) Measured fromrom your floor to the center of your keyboard. 40 inches (101 cm) Measured from your floor to the center of your keyboard. 43 inches (109 cm) Measured from your floor to the center of your device. 16.5 inches (42 cm) Measured from your tabletop to the center of your device. 56 inches (142 cm) Our Highest! Measured from your floor to the center of your Book. Height adjusts from 13” to 32” for wide range of uses such as watching videos, filming videos, reading the news, working on your email, taking picture, and more

item.title: The Ultimate Easy to Clean XXL Puppy Whelping Pad 72″x72″ – Our Washable Super Absorption Pee Pad is Perfect for Your Whelping Box Or Exercise Playpen- The Durable Non Slip Floor Mat for Dogs
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand WE ONLY HAVE ONE GOAL: To deliver beautiful and simplistic products that you love – every day! WHAT MAKES US UNIQUE? We are a small family-run company founded by John & Carrie in 2019. Our entire product line is proudly designed in the USA. We have a ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $54.97 - $39.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:17:30 UTC – Details)

From the brand

WE ONLY HAVE ONE GOAL:

To deliver beautiful and simplistic products that you love – every day!

WHAT MAKES US UNIQUE?

We are a small family-run company founded by John & Carrie in 2019. Our entire product line is proudly designed in the USA. We have a fantastic selection of stationery incl. planners & calendars, journals, organizers, and much more.

That “more” is providing the very best customer experience possible!

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 72 x 72 x 0.2 inches; 4.4 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ zic-peepad74-39
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 6, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ ZICOTO
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B085LLL9X9

Premium Non-Slip Material For Your Hardwood Floor: The bottom layer minimize the pad slipping on floors and stays safe in place; Top-notch materials & a heavy-duty black stitch design create a puppy pad with high durability
XXL Size For Playpens: With extra large 72″x72” the dog pen mat is perfectly sized for a standard indoor dog playpen/fence and it comes with rounded corners for the best fit
Washable & Reusable: Washable dog pee pads provide excellent value! Cut down the costs with reusable dog incontinence pads & simply put the pee pad up to 170°F in the washer & it will be like new
Extremely Versatile: Besides the benefits of the puppy training pads used for whelping or housebreaking, the piddle pads for dogs are also fantastic for floor and seat protection & as pads for any other pet playpen or rodent cages

THE REUSABLE ZICOTO DOG PEE PAD – 72″x72″

GROUNDBREAKING FOR WHELPING & RAISING PUPPIES

It is soft, waterproof, super absorbent and not only reduces any messy leaks, but also improves the well-being of your pup or adult dog: The premium washable dog pee pad for indoor dog pens from ZICOTO PETS. Thanks to a premium fabric multilayer design, maximum protection is ensured – for happy dogs, clean & dry floors and even happier dog owners:

– Top: quick absorption of liquids and discharge to 2nd layer – 2nd Layer: high density thickness & extremely absorbent – 3rd Layer: waterproof & breathable to prevent fluids from soaking through to the floor – Bottom: slip reducing fabric to keep the pee pad in place at all times

The extra large 72″x72″ dog exercise pad is a fantastic liner for your whelping box and housebreaking/potty training for a standard size indoor puppy playpen. This mat also suitable for kennels, as well as a car seat, furniture rug pad & hardwood floor protection and can be used for other pets like rabbits, or guinea pigs too.

The practical grey design combined with the black stitching fits perfectly with almost any interior.

Easily Machine washable & reusable – reduce trash, save money & protect the environment No need to buy disposal puppy pee pads, as ZICOTO Pee Pads are easy to take care of and can be reused for a long time to come. Please follow the simple washing instructions to get the most out of your XXL pee pad.

Upgrade your everyday life as dog parent with the washable dog pee pad by ZICOTO PETS!

Note: 1 reusable pad 72″x72″ incl (accessories/supplies shown in the images are not incl.).

4.5
Price: $54.97 - $39.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:17:30 UTC – Details)

Our Advanced Performance Rubber Polymers are Tested for Extreme Conditions to Ensure they Don’t Crack, Split or Deform
No-Slip Grip – Rubberized Nibs on the Bottom so the Mat Does not Move – Ergonomic Grooves on Top to Give your Foot Traction and Comfort
Built for Protection – Guard Against Spills, or Debris – Built to Last through Rain, Snow, Mud and More – Anti-Slip Backing – Set of Front, Rear and Trunk Liner for Full Protection
Designed for Compatibility – Made to be Trimble to Fit your Vehicle’s Floor Contours with only a Pair of Scissors – Please Check the Dimensions before Installation – Size: front (27 in. x 18 in. ) rear (17 in. x 54 in. )
Simple Installation – Place the Mats on the Floor of your Vehicle after Trimming – Easily Remove and Clean the Mats of any Dirt and Spills.

No-Slip Grip – Rubberized Nibs on the Bottom so the Mat Does not Move – Ergonomic Grooves on Top to Give your Foot Traction & Comfort
Built for Protection – Guard Against Spills, or Debris – Built to Last through Rain, Snow, Mud and More – Anti-Slip Backing – Set of Front, Rear & Trunk Liner for Full Protection
Simple Installation – Place the Mats on the Floor of your Vehicle after Trimming – Easily Remove and Clean the Mats of any Dirt & Spills
Our Advanced Performance Rubber Polymers are Tested for Extreme Conditions to Ensure they Don’t Crack, Split or Deform

Read more

All Season Heavy Duty Rubber Floor Mat Set

Protect your vehicle’s flooring by catching spills, stains, dirt and debris that other floor mats can miss. These mats are durable and long lasting and will withstand normal wear and tear.

No matter how careful you are, your new ride might become less-than-perfect with all the typical wear-and-tear that’s inflicted after owning any car for some time. So what can you do to protect your vehicle? You can have a piece of mind knowing your vehicle is up to date with the best accessories.

Features

  • Stain Protection
  • Custom Trim To Fit
  • Waterproof & Weatherproof
  • No-slip Grip Rubberized Nibs
  • Universal Fit most Cars, SUVs, Trucks and Vans

Read more

Highest Quality and Innovative Designs

Heavy Duty All Season Weather Protection

Our waterproof floor mats help trap spillage such as rain. Helps to keep your flooring dry.

Extra High Ridge-line Design

The extra high ridge line design will trap liquids and debris preventing them from reaching your original flooring. The trapped debris can easily be expelled by removing the mat and rinsing it off. This works especially well for rainy and/or snowy climates.

Strong Anti-Slip Backing

These mats are designed with an anti-slip backing. This helps to prevent the mats from slipping under pedals while driving. It keeps the mat in place as you get in and out of your vehicle.

Read more

Durable Material

Our material is an extremely flexible material used in new rubber floor mats for vehicles. These mats are very durable and can withstand various weather conditions such as extreme heat or extreme cold. They will not melt in high heat and will not crack in severe cold. This soft and flexible material provides for a long-lasting floor mat unlike other non-flexible mats that can crack under extreme conditions.

Read more
